text:
Fritz Lichtenhahn (6 May 1932 – 24 May 2017) was a Swiss actor. He was born in Arosa, Switzerland. He was known for his movies "Alle Jahre wieder: Die Familie Semmeling" (1976), "Germany Pale Mother" (1980) and "Schtonk" (1992).
Lichtenhahn died on May 24, 2017 in Hamburg, Germany at the age of 85.
